description:
Specifically designed to provide increased overtravel, greatly improved reliability and operation. Titanium provides virtual immunity to seawater corrosion, thereby significantly increasing service life and reducing subsea maintenance and downtime costs. Titanium is used in subsea systems for its corrosion resistance, maintenance reduction, and its mechanical property advantages. With titanium subsea reliably is improved. Custom configurations are available. Can be supplied with a molded underwater cable and connector or PBOF (Pressure Balanced Oil Filled adapter) right angle or straight as shown in photo above.

Features:
● Reliability and long service life
● NAVSEA qualified
● Meets IPX8 of IEC 529 - Protected against continuous immersion
● Submersible to 10,000 psi
● Zero power consumption
● Long contact life
● Bounce free switching
● Abundant overtravel
● Hermetic sealed
● Titanium
